item.name: Home
item.description: My love of all things potato is well documented. It was thus only a matter of time before I decided I should add potatoes not just on top of my bread, but inside of it. What resulted was the softest bread I’ve ever eaten–basically garlic mashed potatoes in bread form. I mean, who wouldn’t be […]
